  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1                     Unpleasant sweaty or hairy ball smell to some noses

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324513" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); I can only pour this much black pepper into my soup. Therefore, this smell is the smell of soup for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2324513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2324513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306511" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306511" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dvorask"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195070"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dvorask" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-L-Eau-46400.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46400.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme L'Eau"title="Prada L'Homme L'Eau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306511ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306511" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195070">Dvorask</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 03:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A rose for those who don't like rose. The fresh spiciness almost overwhelms the rosiness, and combined with the woodiness, what is left of the rose is something timid, wispy and barely there.<br />
<br />
An interesting foray for someone who wants to get into rose, but if you're looking for something that has a more present and/or full-bodied rose, this isn't it.<br />
<br />
This actually reminds me quite a bit of ELDO Hermann, with the same briskness, mildly-tart drydown. There must be some aromachemical that is being used in both.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2306511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2306511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299315" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sl1108"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2008312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sl1108" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299315ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299315" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008312">sl1108</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unique, elegant, fresh rose with gin and tonic... as someone finds rose too stuffy and associates it with old soap, this is  one of the best rose fragrances i've tried... absolutely unisex</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2299315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2299315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279897" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="7amdy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1788059"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1788059.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="7amdy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Red-18598.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18598.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Red"title="Polo Red"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279897ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279897" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1788059">7amdy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 23:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not excessively masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2279897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2279897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275997" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275997" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Demani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2246156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Demani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275997ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275997" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156">Demani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with peppery fresh and spicy juniper/gin note<br />
As it dries i can sense a strong rose note but it's not overwhelming it blends quite nicely with gin<br />
There are some dry woody notes in the base</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2275997"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2275997#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255052" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 05:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Much Ado About the Duke is a surprising, unusual scent. A masculine take on rose, I expected a watered-down Middle Eastern-style rose-oud. Instead, this is something quite unique. A sheer freshie while being primarily a peppery rose scent, it is surprisingly cohesive. Its performance is limited, which is the main drawback, but there is much to admire here.<br />
<br />
MAATD opens with a surprising juniper note, bracingly fresh and slightly green. The opening booziness alongside the dewy texture brings it firmly to gin territory. The rose follows, shy and dewy, complemented nicely by peppery spice. It works so well alongside the gin note. <br />
<br />
The leather base emerges after a little while, smooth and softly musky, subtly grounding the peppery rose. It remains very lightweight, fading quickly to become a skin scent. Sillage is moderate at a push and longevity is weak. It is a spring/summer daytime scent, masculine-leaning in my opinion. <br />
<br />
Elegant and discreet, as Penhaligon's tend to be, MAATD is a creative yet wearable scent. A great warm weather masculine that manages to be different. Pity about the performance-price ratio. 4/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2255052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2255052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2251260" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ohuz01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580459"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580459.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ohuz01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2251260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2251260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580459">ohuz01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 08:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My favourite from the portraits lineup, so unexpected! I’m a rose fan and this one is just perfect, the femininity of the floral is totally made unisex by the black pepper and juniper from the gin making it feel so classy yet modern. I also detect a slightly cumin note. Day or night I think it would make any occasion feel special. Performance and longevity is underwhelming, especially considering the huge price tag. Mostly paying for the bottle design I guess. I’d be interested to compare this to le labo rose 31 as I’ve heard it’s similar but with far better performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2251260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2251260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197378" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197378" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FloridaFrags33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2174980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FloridaFrags33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197378ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197378" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2174980">FloridaFrags33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 14:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this fragrance; one of my all time favorite scents. I just can't get enough of it, I always want more! That always wanting more leads me to the performance. This scent does not really have much performance to speak of. After maybe 45 minutes to an hour this is a skin scent or nearly gone all together. Really makes me so sad because I love this scent dearly and much much more than the similar offering from Le Labo. Although very similar, this one gives me a much more masculine appeal that I can't get enough of. My girlfriend loves this on me and it makes me feel like a mob boss when I wear it. A very wealthy and successful man in a nice linen outfit is what this reminds me of. This is one of those scents that is understated but you can tell the person wearing it doesn't F around. This is a scent for those that did the hard work when no one was watching and are now enjoying the fruits of their labor. Like I said, one of my all time favorites and a truly impeccable fragrance. It might not be the most unique; but this will make you smell like you are in charge. I love Penhaligon's and I will continue to buy their fragrances despite some of the performance issues I've experienced with them. Also, $315 for a 75ML of this is pretty steep. Especially with the performance issues; if this was around the $250 or $225 mark; I would have a stash of 10 bottles of this stuff. It's that good!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2197378"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2197378#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169050" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lostnose2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lostnose2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834">lostnose2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-27">05/27/24 04:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Complaints of "not enough rose". Yep, but that doesn't matter.  It is a nice fragrance.  Good blend. Dapper delight.  The complaints should be about performance. Especially, for the price. Composition is great and leads to.an enjoyable experience.  Only if it would last and then there would be much ado. For now it is a fleeting encounter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2169050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2169050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105495" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 01:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Pros at the top of the page are not wrong. "Unexpected and unique" hits the nail right on the head. I was expecting the rose to come on strong and floral like the others in this collection. Yes the rose is there but the pepper packs a strong punch. I don't like how rose in fragrances really dominates but the pepper ,gin , woods and leather stay pretty balanced with the rose . I will say that as this does dry down the powdery of the rose does come out a bit more but only if you have your nose right on the skin. Smelling it from an inch or 2 away still gives you a bunch of the wood gin and pepper notes. This is something different and I really like that . A little more pepper and gin and this would have been a mega banger . But it's still very good. This works year round night and day. Performance , it will stick on the skin for a solid 5 to 6 hours . Projection 2 to 3 hours . <br />
This is not a good blind buy . The pepper will throw people off. It's strong like cracked pepper at first then mellows out to whole fresh black pepper . I'd say it's pretty unisex for a rose forward fragrance<br />
Scent -7.5<br />
Complexity - 9.0<br />
Quality - 10.0<br />
Performance - 7.0<br />
Bottle 10.0</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2105495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2105495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2082344" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpsottak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1460598.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpsottak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2082344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2082344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598">cpsottak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I may enjoy many fragrances over this one, but nothing is a more fitting choice for a charcoal grey suit. This fragrance is perfect for the dapper gentleman, and in penhaligons style, it’s not obnoxiously strong. You will certainly be making the statement of how distinguished you are by wearing this fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2082344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2082344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2067507" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xvxmatthewxvx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1028003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xvxmatthewxvx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Five-O-Clock-Au-Gingembre-2764.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2764.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"title="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2067507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2067507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003">xvxmatthewxvx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 15:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>starts off woody then becomes fruity candied orange rose with musk &amp; amber, the late dry down is the booze &amp; sweaty skin animalic musk of Idole by Lubin.  It’s mostly a skin scent until you move around and it projects a bit more but overall it’s mostly soft to medium projection. It’s a nice scent but I’m not sure it’s worth what they’re asking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2067507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2067507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007595" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-21">12/21/23 22:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lots of pepper and juniper in the opening, maybe even a hint of eucalyptus.<br />
It packs a pretty boozy punch at first which many will find unpleasant.<br />
<br />
There's spicy woodiness, maybe some cumin or cardamom in the base that feels vaguely christmassy to me.<br />
<br />
There's a note that I can't quite distinguish in the dry-down that I'm finding quite sickening. It's a soapy quality that feels like it exists to hold the abundance of pepper together, but it has a 'herbal medicine' effect on me. I can't help but think of a soothing ointment for insect bites.<br />
<br />
The dry-down to me is worse than the opening. It's like a monotone, droning, buzzing noise. A throat-catching concoction of spice, botanicals and bar-soap.<br />
<br />
This is faux gentlemanly. Annoying dinner party guest, weird uncle, creepy co-worker. <br />
Call HR if you smell this in the workplace.<br />
<br />
VERDICT: In terms of gender profile. This is unisex, as in, both genders should avoid it.<br />
Luckily the sillage is low or this would be getting washed off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="2007595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=2007595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990923" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tee22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1649813"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1649813.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tee22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Valaya-78574.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78574.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valaya"title="Valaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1649813">Tee22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-02">12/02/23 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very woody, and peppery. Masculine</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1990923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1990923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980933" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Toobhai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1494080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1494080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Toobhai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40713.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Much Ado About The Duke"title="Much Ado About The Duke"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1494080">Toobhai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another one Cant's judge the note but better than what you best when you sniff !<br />
<br />
Beauty with the brain and the Man who is unique and does everything like he wanted!<br />
For me on me 10/10 (my signature)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1980933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1980933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1979260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1979260" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Toyboy38"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414444.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Toyboy38" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Papilefiko-74667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Papilefiko"title="Papilefiko"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1979260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1979260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414444">Toyboy38</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-18">11/18/23 00:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Purchased Penhaligon's Portraits Scent Library Discovery Set recently and what a true treasure of a house. After having smelled Duke this time. It reminded me of an interesting soap. Something definitely I've smelled before in the past, but my memory doesn't serve me at this point. But think of an older barbershop/shaving cream and an extremely masculine scent.<br />
<br />
After initial spray. OMG NO! was my reaction. That is because I didn't test this properly. I was spraying the scents on strips one after another and sniffing frantically to quench my thirst for finding a new signature scent to add to my 50+ collection....<br />
<br />
After I became conscience of my actions, I decided to just take a shower and give this a full wearing as I did the groceries. <br />
<br />
This is a mature scent. My 0/10 score suddenly changed to more of a 7/10. I like it. Don't love it.<br />
It's dry, woody, commanding, comforting and clean with a big touch of 'old smelling'. It smells dated, but in a good way. <br />
<br />
Any season, any reason. But this shines best in colder weather. Both day or night.<br />
<br />
For me it's an 7/10 on the drydown (about 30 mins in)<br />
Another scent I appreciate, but also recognise it's not for me.<br />
<br />
To my nose it's masculine, even though there is a rose note.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1979260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1979260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1973492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700820">jessica_chinos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-07">09/07/23 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quite prefer Le Labo Rose 31 on a man. So much better than this one, deeper and sexy.<br />
This one smells quite faint and synthetic, not the quality you should expect from the price. The gin &amp; tonic note is quite noticeable, and the leather is there, it's a classy men's scent...<br />
I quite dislike the synthetic aftersmell of this...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1922149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1922149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1909556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
