It's very very spicy to the point that it makes me sneeze!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1892401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1892401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1884622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1884622" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lord Lucan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1532517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lord Lucan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Marylebone-Wood-49654.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49654.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Marylebone Wood"title="Marylebone Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1884622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1884622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532517">Lord Lucan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-22">07/22/23 13:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very standard floral scent, definitely for men not women, did not think much of it, just the usual run of the mill floral bouquet type of fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1884622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1884622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1870776" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1870776" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MagicBez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516109"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516109.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MagicBez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1870776ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1870776" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516109">MagicBez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-04">07/04/23 03:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This feels like a traditional "manly floral" scent to me - it lasts well but on my skin ages poorly, after a few hours it starts to get less floral and more leathery/woody but in a way that gives me a faint body odour vibe.<br />
<br />
If you're after a classic "manly" scent Penhaligons offers some much better options to my mind, first and foremost 'The Inimitable William Penhaligon'</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1870776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1870776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869571" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1869571" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Whateverwhocares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Whateverwhocares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1869571ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1869571" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007">Whateverwhocares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-02">07/02/23 11:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very airy. Almost like it’s not there at all. Rose based. It’s either very complicated, or not complicated at all. I can’t tell. On paper; on skin; it’s barely there. Mild woody…essence? Mild is the keyword here. I like subtlety but come on… this thing is a ghost 👻. <br />
<br />
Seems like a nice scent lol. Multi-faceted in that no one will ever know you’re wearing it. This could be your thing if you’re looking to keep a low profile. If you want to disappear into the phantom level, wear this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1869571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1869571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1868505" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1868505" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heartsauce"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334848"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1334848.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heartsauce" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1868505ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1868505" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334848">heartsauce</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-30">06/30/23 22:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le Labo Rose 31 but more expensive with none of the projection or sillage. It's also missing some of the character... the nuclear rose of the Le Labo iteration makes it alien and desirable for the rose-wary like me. <br />
<br />
It's possible the less in-your-face presence might be desirable to some, but I suspect many are justifying their purchases. I'd rather just walk through a mist of Rose 31.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1868505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1868505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1862793" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mdk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1756484.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mdk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-des-Sens-Eau-de-Toilette-35678.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35678.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"title="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1862793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1862793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484">Mdk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A gentle manly scent.<br />
The combination of rose, spice and wood is interesting. Yes, it has pepper - it tickles my nose a little.<br />
There is also a change in the scent, and it is one of the portrait collection that I liked.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1862793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1862793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1852979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="feuermaiden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1684821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="feuermaiden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boy-Smells/Woodphoria-75837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woodphoria"title="Woodphoria"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821">feuermaiden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-09">06/09/23 19:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a regal, gentlemanly fragrance and that's no surprise considering this is Penhaligon's. <br />
<br />
It's a pleasant rosy scent with slight aromatic woods in the background. I get a lot of the spicy pepper in the opening as well. So warm and cozy and luxury clean. Like a rich person’s soap you use in their super ornate, 19th century bathroom. <br />
<br />
It leans masculine to me, but can definitely be a unisex fragrance! I think I'll give this sample to my husband.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1852979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1852979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1842351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1842351" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1842351ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1842351" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-26">05/26/23 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well British houses do typically reflect that characteristic English cultural trait of understatement. Part and parcel of their concept of the gentleman ideal. Penhaligon and Floris are known for understated performance. And Much Ado About the Duke is understated in performance all right. As far as scent profile,  I don't know, it sort of reminds me of a toned down Maison Martin Margiela Soul of the Forest with some D.S &amp; Durga Radio Bombay mixed in, which is great because I have bottles of both and hold them in high regard. It achieves that similarity with different notes than those two, and with the fir, maple, and incense of the Margiela toned way down and the sandalwood of Radio Bombay turned way down, and with gin added, but that's about the overall effect with much subdued performance. Oh, and the rose accord should not be listed as the second most prominent accord as it is here as it is very subdued. But at any rate, Much Ado about the Duke is a great scent profile, enough so it's one of my full bottle buys. With its pleasant scent profile and understated performance it'll be a great addition to my "Office Scent" collection.<br />
<br />
UPDATE: Much Ado About the Duke added to the new Penhaligon's The Dandy is a fantastic layering combination! I call it my "Dandy Duke" combo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1842351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1842351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831127" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831127" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hojubaby"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hojubaby" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Tilia-91688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tilia"title="Tilia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831127ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831127" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178633">Hojubaby</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 03:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is indeed a very nice gentlemanly scent, its very sophisticated and great smelling, wish it was more unisex to be fair. <br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1831127"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1831127#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1823322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1823322" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="leto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1823322ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1823322" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40660">leto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-02">05/02/23 14:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is basically Le Labo Rose31 with cumin toned down and juniper amped up. No surprise, both have the same perfumer.<br />
<br />
Of course smells great. Choose this one if Rose31's cumin upsets you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1823322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1823322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820956" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-29">04/29/23 15:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like like a quintessential British gentleman's fragrance. I don't recall trying a lot of others with gin besides Rake and Ruin and Bond No 9 Brooklyn, and this is much better than those imo.<br />
<br />
The rose isn't prominent but it's there, and it has a green streak that is more apparent. Smells like a well groomed and well dressed man on Savile Row. But it's also not so astute that I feel I'd feel awkward wearing it casually.<br />
<br />
Scent 9.3/10<br />
Performance TBD</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1820956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1820956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786272" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786272" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786272ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786272" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-17">03/17/23 21:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The duke has got me on a choke holdddd. This is such a great unisex fragrance. This blend with the peppery yet fresh spice mixed with the rose somehow brings out this unique grounding white musk scent. I have never smelled anything quite like it. This perfume reminds me of a single vibing and thriving parent who owns a white yacht in Croatia. They also are the type to empower you with the most wittiest and mindblowing affirmations. Literally feels like a royal scent.<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
<br />
⬆️Libra ☀️Capricorn 🌜Scorpio</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1786272"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1786272#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1777318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1777318" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="asiu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1689198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="asiu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Rose-31-3678.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3678.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose 31"title="Rose 31"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1777318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1777318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689198">asiu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-07">03/07/23 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finding a fragrance that is both beautiful and unique can be a challenging task, but this one seems to tick all the right boxes. Despite being categorized as a male fragrance, I find it to be feminine, with a simple and beautiful scent pyramid. The combination of rose and gin creates a delightful aroma that's not overpowering but lingers just enough to leave a lasting impression. While the performance could be better for the price, it's by no means the worst, and the overall quality of the fragrance makes it worth the investment. All in all, it's a stunning fragrance that I would recommend to anyone looking for a unique and elegant scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1777318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1777318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1759548" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like the fragrance, but It is not my favorite from the Portraits series. 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1759548"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1759548#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A peppery rose that smelled more like vetiver at times. Not bad but not great either.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1694135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1694135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's too good a chance to miss, so I'd say it's rather much ado about nothing, and the poor duke is rather poorly served. Not as badly as "Endymion", but still, he deserved better. And so did all of us who bought this for the hope of a good scent, and not just an elegant bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1631216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1631216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1612896" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This one is very wearable and suitable for any occasion. Has plenty of zing which I love. <br />
The only problem I have is a lack of longevity, but the bottle is to die for.<br />
The Duke is fine and dandy. Big love for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1602184"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1602184#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1602176" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very aromatic and refreshing - must be the gin.<br />
I'd say this is a unisex scent. <br />
Very understated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1602176"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1602176#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1566067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1566067" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Celestya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1251713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Celestya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Margot-Tita/Week-End-au-Ferret-91823.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91823.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Week-End au Ferret"title="Week-End au Ferret"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1566067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1566067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251713">Celestya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-17">05/17/22 22:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For rose lovers, in fact Rose is the star of this perfume.. A natural rose, unisex. I can smell rose, wood and pepper. More for fall and winter. Not sweet, but not too floral. If you like rose ardoise or Rose 31, you need to try. <br />
7/10<br />
<br />
For winter, for myself, in this brand: Yasmine (cardamon, vanilla, coffee) &gt; Constance (caramel &amp; cardamon) &gt; Duke (rose, wood, pepper).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1566067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1566067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1562530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1562530" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Omiyuu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1486849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Omiyuu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1562530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1562530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486849">Omiyuu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-12">05/12/22 14:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A relatively overlooked perfume from the Portraits Collection. Those that overlook this are not missing out on much. This perfume is not very exciting, seductive or captivating - but, it is appealing. <br />
<br />
It starts of with a lot of gin and rose, and a faint bit of leather. There may be some woody notes but deep in there, so much so that you have to whiff extra hard for it to be noticeable. The dry down involves the aforementioned strong notes fading to a harmonious balance with the rest. It then lasts about 7hours or so before fading away. The projection is moderate provided you spray more than a few times. <br />
<br />
Nothing too noteworthy about this scent, and for most people it would definitely not be something worth spending £200+ on. Nevertheless, it is one of those nice, clean smells that sits close to the skin, where you would be happy knowing that you got it on you. Perfect for a relaxing Sunday at home.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1562530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1562530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1559802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1559802" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vincents1278"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/30992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.30992.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vincents1278" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Petit-Matin-40817.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40817.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Petit Matin"title="Petit Matin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1559802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1559802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/30992">Vincents1278</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-08">05/08/22 13:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This I have in a sample atomizer.  Dirty rose is what I think of when I think about this fragrance. I get incense, not sure about “pepper”, but okay.  Pepper. Dirty spicy rose. <br />
I get some musk or maybe agar. Dirty. In a good way. Love the dirty and the musty dark rose. Smells like an affair, a tryst, in a closet during a party. Filthy filthy rose. <br />
Also, if you like this, a slightly less dirty rose is Halfetti. Also Penhaligons but less expensive than this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1559802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1559802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1553245" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1553245" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Josu01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019527"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1019527.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Josu01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Absolu-91053.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91053.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Absolu"title="Scandal Pour Homme Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1553245ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1553245" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019527">Josu01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-29">04/29/22 06:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this.  Starts with a (very pleasant) big dose of Rose and pepper, with the gin in the back, and the woody notes even further back.  I don't get the leather note. Nicely done. <br />
<br />
I don't care to much about beast mode scents, and this is perfect, but I do care about longevity, and MAATD doesn't last on my skin for more than a couple of hours. With a better staying power, maybe I'd consider a FB.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1553245"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1553245#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527178" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lovlust"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1472062.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="lovlust" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527178ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527178" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472062">lovlust</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-20">03/20/22 16:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a sample of this (which I accidentally spilled all over my desk, oops), and I think the alcoholic smell and some of the pepper were so strong to me that they blinded my nose to the rose notes. I love rose, it's one of my favorite scents and even flavors, but I could barely smell it here over the gin. The projection wasn't great, though now that I'm sitting at my desk the next day I can unfortunately still smell it wafting up from its surface. As a lover of rose and also as someone looking for a masculine scent, I was disappointed that this one didn't live up to my excitement.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1527178"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1527178#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1525606" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gotoperfume"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1440980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="gotoperfume" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1525606ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1525606" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1440980">gotoperfume</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-18">03/18/22 06:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not fan of this one from the portraits collection if I'm honest. I had a brand new bottle but sold it immediately after. It comes across way too peppery and heavy on the leather to the point where it has too much of a 'dirty' feel to it. It may even come across as smelling like sweat because the pepper combined with the leather and gin are extremely heavy hitting especially in the opening. I sprayed on my jumper and didn't get any rose or sweetness from the rose until it completely dried down after many hours. The rose was nice, but I didn't see myself using this at all as I couldn't stand the strong dirty vibe that it had. <br />
<br />
Scent: 3/10<br />
Projection: 5/10<br />
Longevity: 5/10<br />
<br />
Overall a 4/10 from me, wouldn't recommend it or wear it if I'm honest. That's just my personal opinion and I know that others might love it, but for it's a No-Go.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1525606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1525606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512534" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Spicy! Getting the gin and almost a bit cardamom..It's much less formal than the Lord George, but more like a man at an after-party..Could definitely be used as an office fragrance.. Reminds me of the Tuxedo of YSL..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1512534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1512534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1503087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1503087" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sisina96rv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sisina96rv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Kashkha-CPO-54144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kashkha CPO"title="Kashkha CPO"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1503087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1503087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310820">sisina96rv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-12">02/12/22 12:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A true beauty. In fact, I can wear it as a woman, no problem. Longevity is somewhere up to 7-8 hours. The projection is noticable, first. Later it turns into the skin scent.<br />
<br />
At first, you truly get that pepper and rose, but in the most delicate way. After an hour, it turns and stays fainted rose with some milky, face creamy, jasmine facet, which gives it a depth and roundness. Somewhere in the background some green notes play their music. The whole composition is an art and I find it very appropriate counterpart to the Duchess. Which is more effervescent and sweeter. This is one of those fragrances that make you feel happy and sophisticated at the same time. It's just lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1503087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1503087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1498921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1498921" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="arvisk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286681"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1286681.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="arvisk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Memoir-Man-10145.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10145.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Memoir Man"title="Memoir Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1498921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1498921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286681">arvisk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-06">02/06/22 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This gives me ambiguous feelings. Maybe it's just the batch I got (it was a blind buy so I don't know if this is how it has to be) but the silage is some half a meter for the first hour or so. Later it settles down to become a skin scent and after some 5 hours it's basically gone. Maybe I should spray more? I usually do a couple of puffs on my forearm. As a side note, the atomizer is really nice and feels very soft while pressing it.<br />
As for the scent, I feel rose all the way through. Leather? Maybe but it is well hidden not to be too noticeable. Gin? Depends. Sometimes it's there, but more often it doesn't show up on my skin. In a drydown, I get a hint of honey but no idea why.<br />
In sum, scent is unisex and gorgeous but the fact that it is so weak kinda upsets me. On the other hand, real gentleman doesn't scream with his perfume, right?<br />
<br />
Update: sniffed a tester from "Scent library" - much stronger initial smell and the peppery is very much present for the first 5-10 minutes. Hmmm 🤔</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1498921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1498921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1490407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1490407" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="teh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="teh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pur-Oud-66436.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66436.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pur Oud"title="Pur Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1490407ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1490407" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398">teh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-24">01/24/22 22:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not sure why Daphne Bugey would wanna make another Rose 31 but without the Le Labo signature musky base and with so much poorer performance 😅</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1490407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1490407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1486701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1486701" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miguel Vella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miguel Vella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1486701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1486701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360379">Miguel Vella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-19">01/19/22 15:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my first leather fragrance. It has a delightful mix between spicy and woody and a more fresh and fruity scent.<br />
<br />
Upon applying it the top notes of rose and pepper have a strong yet pleasing scent, which quickly starts showing traces of gin. It finishes off with a strong woody, leathery scent with a hint of cumin to top it all off.<br />
<br />
I prefer to wear this during the day although I have worn it at night on more than one occasion. I bought this specifically to be used during the Fall / Winter / Spring Seasons.<br />
<br />
It has a moderate sillage with a long lasting smell. Price is on the high side but this is applicable to all Penhaligons scents (especially the Portrait Collection), although I can honestly say it is worth the money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1486701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1486701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1471087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1471087" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="derby2169"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1389884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="derby2169" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1899-Hemingway-18846.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18846.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1899 Hemingway"title="1899 Hemingway"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1471087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1471087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884">derby2169</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-27">12/27/21 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is something about the Penhaligon's way of making fragrance that has always stood out to me, but has also kind of bothered me in some offerings and you can absolutely find it here (as well as Savoy steam, roaring radcliff, juniper sling etc.) There is a certain syrupy weight to the scent, like all notes cling together almost like one single accord with top heart and base marinating together. A testament to the blending skills of the perfumer, but at the same time it sacrifices expansion and elevation and evolution in the final product.<br />
<br />
In this case I find the gin the nicest facet, it feels limey and fresh, but also woody and green. There is also a powerful thick sweet powdery rose accord mixing and sweetening the gin. What i cannot stand here is the pepper and it is because of the way Penhaligon's fragrances present. Instead of being a pleasant top note it sticks throughout the duration and ruins the harmony for me like accidentally biting a peppercorn during an otherwise delicious meal.<br />
<br />
Edit: As a great masculine-lining alternative is Frapin l'Humaniste, an interesting gin composition with an interesting peony accord and nutmeg instead of pepper. Much more radiant, smooth, but also more masculine-leaning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1471087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1471087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1439016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1439016" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suavis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408750.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suavis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Puritas-61822.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61822.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Puritas"title="Puritas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1439016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1439016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408750">Suavis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-02">11/02/21 13:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a sample of this gorgeous fragrance... what can I say, I am totally smitten, in love, in heaven. For me this is unisex and timeless. <br />
I can definitely smell gin, pepper, rose and some woody notes. So so delightful. I can't stop sniffing my wrist as I type and the more I sniff the more I convince myself of buying the full bottle.<br />
This fragrance is so well balanced; spicy, warm and very slightly sweet. <br />
I would say I can wear this throughout the year, day and night... yup, I love it that much!.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="40713"comment_id="1439016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html?ccid=1439016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1438966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
